Constructor Detail

MessageDispatcher

public MessageDispatcher()
Create a new MessageDispatcher. Same as MessageDispatcher(false)

MessageDispatcher

public MessageDispatcher(boolean autoDispatch)
Create a new MessageDispatcher.

Parameters:
autoDispatch - true if messages should be automatically dispatched when they expire, false otherwise. If false, delayed messages are dispatched by calling sendPendingMessages
Method Detail

setAutoDispatch

public void setAutoDispatch(boolean autoDispatch)
Parameters:
autoDispatch - true if messages should be automatically dispatched when expired, false otherwise.

Parameters:
message - the message
